posts.title: Choose the perfect design
posts.catagory: Create a unique and beautiful blog
posts.content: Create a beautiful blog that fits your style. Choose from a selection of easy-to-use templates – all with flexible layouts and hundreds of background images – or design something new.

posts.title: Get a free domain
posts.catagory: Create a unique and beautiful blog
posts.content: Give your blog the perfect home. Get a free blogspot.com domain or buy a custom domain with just a few clicks.

posts.title: Earn money
posts.catagory: Create a unique and beautiful blog
posts.content: Get paid for your hard work. Google AdSense can automatically display relevant targeted ads on your blog so that you can earn income by posting about your passion.

posts.title: Know your audience
posts.catagory: Create a unique and beautiful blog
posts.content: Find out which posts are a hit with Blogger’s built-in analytics. You’ll see where your audience is coming from and what they’re interested in. You can even connect your blog directly to Google Analytics for a more detailed look.

posts.title: Hang onto your memories
posts.catagory: Create a unique and beautiful blog
posts.content: Save the moments that matter. Blogger lets you safely store thousands of posts, photos, and more with Google for free.
